UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the KrishiBondhu AI application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

address.description: User's address for weather alerts and localized information.

preferredLanguage.description: User's preferred language for the application.

soilType.description: User's soil type for crop planning.

locationCoordinates.description: User's geographical coordinates for localized services.

Land.title: Land
Land.description: Represents a piece of land a user is farming.

name.description: A user-defined name for the land (e.g., North Field).

area.description: The area of the land in acres or other units.

areaUnit.description: The unit for the area (e.g., acres, bigha).

location.description: The location or address of the land.

UserCrop.title: UserCrop
UserCrop.description: Represents a crop a user is currently farming on a specific land, with AI-driven guidance.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user's crop entry.

cropName.description: The name of the crop being farmed.

sowingDate.description: The date when the crop seeds were sown.

status.description: The current growth stage of the crop, calculated from sowing date.

CropIssue.title: CropIssue
CropIssue.description: Represents a crop issue reported by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the crop issue.

imageURL.description: URL of the image of the affected crop.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the issue was reported.

aiSolution.description: The AI generated solution for the reported crop issue.

WeatherAlert.title: WeatherAlert
WeatherAlert.description: Represents a weather alert for a specific region.

id.description: Unique identifier for the weather alert.

region.description: Region for which the weather alert is issued.

alertType.description: Type of weather alert (e.g., flood, drought).

severity.description: Severity of the weather alert (e.g., high, medium, low).

message.description: Detailed message of the weather alert.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the alert was issued.

CommunityPost.title: CommunityPost
CommunityPost.description: Represents a post in the community forum.

id.description: Unique identifier for the community post.

imageURL.description: Optional URL of the image included in the post.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the post was created.

MarketPrice.title: MarketPrice
MarketPrice.description: Represents the market price of a specific crop.

id.description: Unique identifier for the market price entry.

pricePerUnit.description: Price per unit of the crop.

date.description: Date when the price was recorded.

definition.description: Stores user profiles, accessible only to the respective user.
Stores lands owned by a user.
Stores the crops a user is currently farming on a specific land. Accessible only by the respective user.
Stores crop issues reported by users. Accessible only by the respective user.
Stores community posts created by users. Accessible only by the respective user.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is updated to support multiple lands per user. A new top-level collection `lands` is added under each user's document (`/users/{userId}/lands/{landId}`). The `crops` collection is now a subcollection of a `land`, enabling a many-to-many relationship between users and crops via lands. This is a more scalable and organized way to manage multiple farming plots. Other collections remain unchanged.
